headline.main: Biden, Clinton Among Hundreds Who Honor Former Senator Ford
headline.print_headline: Biden, Clinton Among Hundreds Who Honor Former Senator Ford

docs.snippet: Vice President Joe Biden knew former Kentucky governor and U.S. Sen. Wendell Ford as a trusted adviser and Bill Clinton knew him as the man who first introduced Clinton as President of the United States....
docs.lead_paragraph: Vice President Joe Biden knew former Kentucky governor and U.S. Sen. Wendell Ford as a trusted adviser and Bill Clinton knew him as the man who first introduced Clinton as President of the United States.

headline.main: FTC Clears Albertsons' Purchase of Safeway
headline.print_headline: FTC Clears Albertsons' Purchase of Safeway

docs.snippet: Supermarket chain Albertsons says U.S. regulators have approved its purchase of competitor Safeway Inc....

headline.main: 2 Arizona Law Officers Wounded in Shootout; Suspect Dead
headline.print_headline: 2 Arizona Law Officers Wounded in Shootout; Suspect Dead

docs.snippet: Two Arizona law enforcement officers were recovering Tuesday after being wounded in a shootout that killed a domestic violence suspect in a small mining town near the New Mexico border, authorities said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two Arizona law enforcement officers were recovering Tuesday after being wounded in a shootout that killed a domestic violence suspect in a small mining town near the New Mexico border, authorities said.

headline.main: Woman and Her 8-Year-Old Son Shot in St. Louis
headline.print_headline: Woman and Her 8-Year-Old Son Shot in St. Louis

docs.snippet: An 8-year-old St. Louis boy went to school and told an office worker he had been shot, after his mother exchanged gunfire with a man who tried to force his way into a home, police said Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: An 8-year-old St. Louis boy went to school and told an office worker he had been shot, after his mother exchanged gunfire with a man who tried to force his way into a home, police said Tuesday.

headline.main: Man Accused of Running Over Woman Twice on Side of Freeway
headline.print_headline: Man Accused of Running Over Woman Twice on Side of Freeway

docs.snippet: A driver has been arrested after authorities say he ran over his passenger twice after arguing with her on the side of a San Francisco Bay Area freeway....
docs.lead_paragraph: A driver has been arrested after authorities say he ran over his passenger twice after arguing with her on the side of a San Francisco Bay Area freeway.

headline.main: Mr Incredible Convicted of Attacking Batgirl on Hollywood Boulevard
headline.print_headline: Mr Incredible Convicted of Attacking Batgirl on Hollywood Boulevard

docs.snippet: A man who dresses as the comic superhero Mr. Incredible has been sentenced to 3 years probation after pleading guilty to attacking a woman costumed as Batgirl in a Hollywood Boulevard turf dispute, prosecutors said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man who dresses as the comic superhero Mr. Incredible has been sentenced to 3 years probation after pleading guilty to attacking a woman costumed as Batgirl in a Hollywood Boulevard turf dispute, prosecutors said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Egyptian Police Criticized Over Death of Female Protester
headline.print_headline: Egyptian Police Criticized Over Death of Female Protester

docs.snippet: Egypt's police are coming under withering criticism as signs mount that officers not only fired birdshot at a young mother during a peaceful protest last weekend but then also hampered efforts to save her life by ignoring pleas to let an ambulance...
docs.lead_paragraph: Egypt's police are coming under withering criticism as signs mount that officers not only fired birdshot at a young mother during a peaceful protest last weekend but then also hampered efforts to save her life by ignoring pleas to let an ambulance take her away.

docs.snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel defended his coming speech before Congress about Iran after critics accused him of trying to win an election scheduled two weeks after the trip....
